MS.S: DSC resources for configuration of a Windows computer. These DSC resources allow you to perform computer management tasks, such as renaming the computer, joining a domain and scheduling tasks as well as configuring items such as virtual memory, event logs, time zones and power settings.
Copyright the DSC Community contributors. All rights reserved.

## [8.5.0] - 2021-09-13_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- WindowsEventLog_x000D__x000A_ - Added support to restrict guest access - Fixes [Issue #338](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/338)._x000D__x000A_ - Added support to create custom event sources and optionally register_x000D__x000A_ resource files - Fixes [Issue #355](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/355)._x000D__x000A_- WindowsCapability_x000D__x000A_ - Added the 'Source' parameter for Add-WindowsCapability as an_x000D__x000A_ optional parameter - Fixes [Issue #361](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/361)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- WindowsEventLog_x000D__x000A_ - Reformatted code to better align with current DSCResources coding standards._x000D__x000A_- Renamed `master` branch to `main` - Fixes [Issue #348](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/348)._x000D__x000A_- Added support for publishing code coverage to `CodeCov.io` and_x000D__x000A_ Azure Pipelines - Fixes [Issue #367](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/367)._x000D__x000A_- Updated build to use `Sampler.GitHubTasks` - Fixes [Issue #365](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/365)._x000D__x000A_- Corrected case of module publish tasks - Fixes [Issue #368](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/368)._x000D__x000A_- Corrected code coverage badge in `README.md`._x000D__x000A_- Updated build pipeline tasks and remove unused environment variables._x000D__x000A_- Removed duplicate code coverage badge._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- WindowsEventLog_x000D__x000A_ - Fixed issue requiring IsEnabled to be declared and set to $true in order_x000D__x000A_ to set the MaximumSizeInBytes property - Fixes [Issue #349](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/349)._x000D__x000A_ - Fixed issue where configuring log retention on a non-classic event log will_x000D__x000A_ throw._x000D__x000A_- ScheduledTask_x000D__x000A_ - Fixed issue with disabling scheduled tasks that have "Run whether user is_x000D__x000A_ logged on or not" configured - Fixes [Issue #306](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/306)._x000D__x000A_ - Fixed issue with `ExecuteAsCredential` not returning fully qualified username_x000D__x000A_ on newer versions of Windows 10 and Windows Server 2019 for both local_x000D__x000A_ accounts and domain accounts - Fixes [Issue #352](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/352)._x000D__x000A_ - Fixed issue with `StartTime` failing Test-Resource if not specified in the_x000D__x000A_ resource - Fixes [Issue #148](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/148)._x000D__x000A_- PendingReboot_x000D__x000A_ - Fixed issue with loading localized data on non en-US operating systems -_x000D__x000A_ Fixes [Issue #350](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/350).
Copyright the DSC Community contributors. All rights reserved.

DSC resources for configuration of a Windows computer. These DSC resources allow you to perform computer management tasks, such as renaming the computer, joining a domain and scheduling tasks as well as configuring items such as virtual memory, event logs, time zones and power settings.

## [8.5.0] - 2021-09-13_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- WindowsEventLog_x000D__x000A_ - Added support to restrict guest access - Fixes [Issue #338](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/338)._x000D__x000A_ - Added support to create custom event sources and optionally register_x000D__x000A_ resource files - Fixes [Issue #355](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/355)._x000D__x000A_- WindowsCapability_x000D__x000A_ - Added the 'Source' parameter for Add-WindowsCapability as an_x000D__x000A_ optional parameter - Fixes [Issue #361](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc/issues/361)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- WindowsEventLog_x000D__x000A_ -
